item.title: Marin add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Marin add a quote by F.E. Smith, Lord Birkenhead
Marin add a quote by Christopher Paolini
item.description: "Because you can't argue with all the fools in the world. It's easier to let them have their way, then trick them when they're not paying attention." -- Christopher Paolini

item.title: Marin add a quote by Oscar Levant
item.description: "There's a fine line between genius and insanity. I have erased this line." -- Oscar Levant

item.title: Marin add a quote by Winston Churchill
item.description: "A lady came up to me one day and said 'Sir! You are drunk', to which I replied 'I am drunk today madam, and tomorrow I shall be sober but you will still be ugly." -- Winston Churchill

item.title: Marin add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Marin add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "How did it get so late so soon?" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Marin add a quote by Meg Cabot
item.description: "Wait. Why am I thinking about Krispy Kremes? We’re supposed to be exercising." -- Meg Cabot

item.title: Marin add a quote by Christopher Paolini
item.description: "Books are my friends, my companions. They make me laugh and cry and find meaning in life." -- Christopher Paolini

item.title: Marin add a quote by Christopher paolini
item.description: "Let no man, in whatever rank or superiority, control your mind and tell you what to do" -- Christopher paolini

item.title: Marin add a quote by Christopher Paolini
item.description: "Wise? No, I simply learned to think." -- Christopher Paolini

item.title: Marin add a quote by Christopher Paolini
item.description: "Keep in mind that many people have died for their beliefs; it's actually quite common. The real courage is in living and suffering for what you believe." -- Christopher Paolini

item.title: Marin add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Marin add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The story so far: In the beginning the Universe was created. This has made a lot of people very angry and been widely regarded as a bad move." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Marin add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "Some humans would do anything to see if it was possible to do it. If you put a large switch in some cave somewhere, with a sign on it saying 'End-of-the-World Switch. PLEASE DO NOT TOUCH', the paint wouldn't even have time to dry." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Marin add a quote by Thomas Szasz
item.description: "Two wrongs don't make a right, but they make a good excuse." -- Thomas Szasz

item.title: Marin add a quote by Anthony G. Oettinger
item.description: "Time flies like an arrow; fruit flies like a banana." -- Anthony G. Oettinger

item.title: Marin add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "There is a theory which states that if ever anyone discovers exactly what the Universe is for and why it is here, it will instantly disappear and be replaced by something even more bizarre and inexplicable. There is another theory which states that this has already happened." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Marin add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Men occasionally stumble over the truth, but most of them pick themselves up and hurry off as if nothing ever happened." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Marin add a quote by Johnny Depp
item.description: "With any part you play, there is a certain amount of yourself in it. There has to be, otherwise it's just not acting. It's lying. " -- Johnny Depp

item.title: Marin add a quote by Johnny Depp
item.description: "Life's pretty good, and why wouldnt it be? I'm a pirate, after all." -- Johnny Depp

item.title: Marin add a quote by Rob Kidd
item.description: "Mr. Sparrow, you will accompany these fine men to the helm and provide us with the bearing to Isla de Muerta. You will then spend the remainder of the voyage contemplating all possible meanings of the phrase 'silent as the grave'. Do I make myself clear?" -- Rob Kidd

item.title: Marin add a quote by Johnny Depp
item.description: "They say the world used to be bigger. The world's still the same--there's just less in it." -- Johnny Depp

item.title: Marin add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "When you're in jail, a good friend will be trying to bail you out. A best friend will be in the cell next to you saying, 'Damn, that was fun'." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Marin add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Marin add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "I am a man" he told her, "and men do not consume pink beverages. Get thee gone woman, and bring me something brown." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Marin add a quote by Cassandra Clare
Marin add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "If you were half as funny as you think you are, you'd be twice as funny as you are now." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Marin add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "Sarcasm is the last refuge of the imaginatively bankrupt." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Marin add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "Are you the one with the blue eyes?" "Actually, my eyes are usually described as golden...and luminous." -- Cassandra Clare
